my_metrics.title: Precision
my_metrics.description: Precision is the ratio of number of true positives to the total number of true positives and false positives.

other_metrics.title: Accuracy
other_metrics.description: Accuracy is the ratio of number of correct predictions to the total number of input samples.

other_metrics.title: Recall
other_metrics.description: Recall is the ratio of number of true positives to the total number of true positives and false negatives.
